attributes.action: Stop importing foreign contractors to work on government contracts at the expense of UK workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Companies like HP are importing Indian contractors to work on Government Contracts at higher cost while making UK employees redundant.  This is a waste of Tax Payers Money, is immoral, and is costing the country money.  There should be a full review of the extent of this practice and it should be outlawed.
